title: Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Immerse yourself in history, or join the Episcopal congregation for services.  Gloria Dei Church is both a National Historic Site and an active house of worship. NPS photo       Interested in the people, places and stories connected with Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site? Explore the History and Culture section for more information about New Sweden, and Gloria Dei Church in the 17th, 18th and 19th centuries.  Find information on everything from church history to a schedule of services on the church's website.
